cons: Eating too many of them may lead to constipation or diarrhea in some people.
description: These nuts are rich in healthy monounsaturated fats which are said to be cardioprotective by reducing cholesterol level and help to clean the arteries.
Macadamias contain copper, B1, magnesium, and manganese which helps to make healthy neurotransmitters, the chemicals which our brain cells use to send chemical signals, and nourish the brain.
Macadamias helps to curb your appetite much longer than a sweet treat.Macadamias are an excellent source of protein, calcium, potassium, dietary fiber and antioxidants.
name: Macadamia

These nuts are popular for improving blood profiles. Since they are rich in fat, they should be consumed in limits.
Yes you can take macadamia in pregnancy.
